title: Topic 002 Question 027
body: You have an Azure subscription that is linked to an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant named contoso.com The subscription contains an Azure SQL database named SQL1 and an Azure web app named app1. App1 has the managed identity feature enabled.
You need to create a new database user for app1.
How should you complete the Transact-SQL statement? To answer select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
